What is the primary function of the Grap: To predict binding sites on proteins with high accuracy and interpretability.
To simulate the folding process of proteins in different environments.
To sequence the genome of SARS-CoV-2 variants.
To design new drug molecules from scratch using AI.
What potential application does the Grap: Designing new nanobodies that could neutralize SARS-CoV-2 variants
Developing antiviral drugs that inhibit viral replication
Creating vaccines that target viral RNA directly
Engineering enzymes to degrade the viral capsid
What type of networks does the GraphRBF: Graph neural networks (GNNs) and radial basis function networks
Convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and recurrent neural networks (RNNs)
Support vector machines (SVMs) and decision trees
Which domains of the SARS-CoV-2 spike pr: Membrane fusion domain and heptad repeat domain
Signal peptide and S1/S2 cleavage site
